reviewText:
Vivien Leigh Is near the top of my list of favorite actresses as well, Miss Barbara Stanwick. Movies were good.
too grainy and dark ( meaning contrast was bad) Its inexpensive. Good value if you get it at a good price.  If you haven't seen Vivien Leigh in Sidewaks of London or Waterloo Bridge- Check them out fantastic story an incredible performance by Ms. Leigh!  Enjoy...
If you like good old movies, you will sure to find at least one of these four movies to love. And it's a heck of a lot cheaper than going to the theater.
